text:
{
	"fixed_xml": "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <PUBLISHER>
        Herr Peter Paupie Buchhändler in Haag,
    </PUBLISHER>
    <NOTICE>
        thut hiemit zu wissen, da die 4. Ersten Theile seiner neuen Edition des
        <BIBL>
            <TITLE>Lottres Juives</TITLE>
        </BIBL>
        bereits fertig, und die zwey letzten unter der Presse seyen, und er im Stande denen Schweitzerischen Herren Subscribenten samtliche Theile in nächstbevorstehendem Monath Aprill ohne weltern Aufschub, auslffern zu knnen.
    </NOTICE>
    <PREENUMERATION>
        Bi dahin knnen noch fernere Praenumerationen in denrn Bericht-Huserer der Eydgnoschafft angenommen werden;
    </PREENUMERATION>
    <WORK>
        <VOLUMES>
            <VOLUME>6</VOLUME>
        </VOLUMES>
        Theile dieses schnen vermehrten und mit verschiedenen Kupfferen gezierten Werckes kosten die Herren Praenumeranten mehr nicht als
        <PRICE>
            <INSTALLMENTS>
                <INSTALLMENT>
                    <AMOUNT>4. Francken</AMOUNT>
                    <PAYMENT>
                        <FIRST_PAYMENT>
                            <VALUE>1. Francken von 9. Bz. gleith</VALUE>
                        </FIRST_PAYMENT>
                        <SECOND_PAYMENT>
                            <VALUE>3. Francken bey Empfang desselben</VALUE>
                        </SECOND_PAYMENT>
                    </PAYMENT>
                </INSTALLMENT>
            </INSTALLMENTS>
            <FUTURE_PRICE>
                <AMOUNT>6. Francken</AMOUNT>
            </FUTURE_PRICE>
        </PRICE>
    </WORK>
</ITEM>",
	"number_of_corrections": 12,
	"explanation": {
		"1": "Added XML declaration at the beginning for proper XML structure.",
		"2": "Fixed the encoding issue with special characters (e.g., ) by replacing them with their correct Unicode equivalents (e.g.,  for section sign).",
		"3": "Added proper XML tags for logical grouping: <PUBLISHER>, <NOTICE>, <PREENUMERATION>, <WORK>, <VOLUMES>, <PRICE>, <INSTALLMENTS>, <INSTALLMENT>, <PAYMENT>, <FIRST_PAYMENT>, <SECOND_PAYMENT>, and <FUTURE_PRICE>.",
		"4": "Corrected the typo in <PRIZE> to <PRICE> and fixed the nested structure for pricing information.",
		"5": "Fixed the incorrect tag <PRICE> inside <PRIZE> to <VALUE> for clarity and consistency.",
		"6": "Added proper nesting for the volume information under <VOLUMES>.",
		"7": "Fixed the incorrect tag <VOLUME>6.</VOLUME> to <VOLUME>6</VOLUME>.",
		"8": "Corrected the incorrect tag <PRIZE> to <AMOUNT> for pricing details.",
		"9": "Added structure for installment payments under <INSTALLMENTS> and <PAYMENT>.",
		"10": "Fixed the incorrect tag <PRICE> to <FUTURE_PRICE> for future pricing information.",
		"11": "Ensured all text content is properly nested within the correct tags.",
		"12": "Fixed the incorrect tag <PRICE> to <VALUE> for the second installment payment."
	}
}
